properties.name: restlight.server.ext.multipart.use-disk
properties.description: Whether to use disk to handle multipart item

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.multipart.memory-threshold
properties.description: The min size(byte) transfer from memory to disk

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.multipart.max-size
properties.description: The max size(byte) limit of single file

properties.name: restlight.server.ext.multipart.temp-dir
properties.description: The base directory of temp file
